<h3 id="X38130">X(38130) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(3), X(9), X(10)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*a^6-5*(b+c)*a^5-(7*b^2+10*b*c+7*c^2)*a^4+2*(b+c)*(5*b^2+2*b*c+5*c^2)*a^3+2*(b^2+4*b*c+c^2)*(b-c)^2*a^2-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(5*b^2+6*b*c+5*c^2)*a+(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38130) = X(7)-7*X(31423) = X(9)+2*X(6684) = X(10)+2*X(31658) = X(40)+5*X(18230) = 4*X(140)-X(5542) = 5*X(631)+X(5223) = X(946)-4*X(6666) = 2*X(1001)+X(11362) = 5*X(1698)+X(5759) = 4*X(3634)-X(5805) = 3*X(21153)+X(38154) = 3*X(26446)-X(38121) = X(38031)-3*X(38067) = 2*X(38043)-3*X(38059) = X(38043)-3*X(38113) = 3*X(38057)-X(38154) = 3*X(38067)+X(38126) = 3*X(38068)-X(38123) = 3*X(38101)-X(38158) = 3*X(38101)-2*X(38179)</b>
<p>X(38130) lies on these lines: {2,38036}, {7,31423}, {9,1158}, {10,31658}, {30,38101}, {35,10392}, {40,18230}, {140,5542}, {142,15296}, {165,5817}, {381,516}, {511,38194}, {515,21153}, {517,38043}, {518,10165}, {519,38031}, {527,38068}, {631,5223}, {758,38132}, {946,6666}, {952,38210}, {971,3740}, {1001,11362}, {1210,15837}, {1445,21620}, {1698,5759}, {2802,38131}, {3576,5686}, {3634,5805}, {3911,15298}, {4312,10588}, {5054,38030}, {5218,10398}, {5690,30331}, {5762,11231}, {5840,38216}, {5847,38117}, {5850,38122}, {5853,38127}, {5856,38133}, {5857,38134}, {5882,24393}, {6594,10265}, {9588,35514}, {10172,38150}, {10863,35595}, {11539,38041}, {12512,31672}, {15709,38024}, {15841,34753}, {19862,20330}, {19875,38149}, {21168,38052}, {28146,38139}, {28194,38037}, {28198,38082}, {28204,38175}, {30329,31837}, {35242,36991}</p>
<p>
X(38130) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {165, 5817}, {3576, 5686}, {21153, 38057}, {21168, 38052}, {38031, 38126}<br>
X(38130) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (38059, 38113), (38150, 10172), (38158, 38179), (38204, 11231)<br>
X(38130) = complement of X(38036)<br>
X(38130) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (38067, 38126, 38031), (38101, 38158, 38179)<br>
</p>
